oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Veterans; Patriotic societies; Older people
United Confederate Veterans, Tennessee Division; Unicoi County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John W. Blankenship seated in a chair. There are three elderly women surrounding him. This is probably a photograph from his 95th birthday celebration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: United Daughters of the Confederacy, Rosalie Blankenship Brown Chapter Scrapbook, 1922-1947
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John W. Blankenship (1844-1943) served in Company B of the Fourth Georgia Regiment between November 4, 1862, and May 12, 1865. He lived at Flagpond (Unicoi County) for more than 60 years.
